name: Plunging Inferno
description:
After a long and happy life, you have finally made your way to heaven.  Across the clouds you see your wife in the distance who passed away many years ago. You begin racing to her, but as soon as she's in reach you miss a cloud and fall down a tunnel to hell.

On a journey to reunite with your wife in heaven, you begin the the path out of hell by navigating tricky platforms, and daring jumps. Along the way you are haunted by bizarre and large versions of yourself and your wife.
